trans-unit.source: The instance context that has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de instância cujo processamento foi concluído.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that is called when an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que é chamado quando o processamento de um objeto <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> é concluído.

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> para notificar o [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] tempo de execução que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> objeto concluiu o processamento.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> has finished its work, WCF calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> once again.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> objeto notifica o tempo de execução que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> concluiu seu trabalho, chamadas WCF <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> novamente.

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: Esse ciclo continua até <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> retorna `true` e o contexto é fechado e reciclado.
